A sermon preached before the Lord Mayor, aldermen, and citizens of London at Bow-Church on the 29th of May 1682. Calamy, Benjamin, 1642-1686.
The second edition.
[4], 35 p.
Printed by J.M. for Walter Kettilby ..., London : 1682.
Reproduction of originals in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York, and University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library. Written by Benjamin Calamy. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
